resources.string: 1. What is the size of Java\'s double datatype?
2. Which of the following are Java datatypes (SELECT all that apply) ?
Inheritance is a technique to define different methods of same type.
It is the process where one object acquires the properties of another.
Inheritance is the ability of an object to take on many forms.
4. Which of the following is TRUE for functional interfaces (SELECT all that apply)?
They may have zero or more static methods.
They are usually marked by @FunctionalInterface annotation.
We can create objects of functional interfaces.
We can create default methods inside functional interfaces .
They contain only one abstract method.
What will be the return type of a method that doesn\'t return any value?
